title: iPhone 12 Pro Review - Skip it IF...
description: my in-depth iPhone 12 Pro review. More Pro & more worth it than you might think. Enjoy!  we made a song out of the MagSafe sound :o  Shot on iPhone 12 Pro - HDR Dolby Vision Footage + channel!  Check out Hoops by WOLF!    Download these clips to watch in HDR! What is HDR?  This ones kind of magic -  That hat shot -  This one slaps -  The Art of HDR - Marc Bach:   VOTE!  SHIRT:   Peter's iPhone 12 Pro Camera Review!  Tyler's iPhone 12: A Photographer's Review  Sam's iPhone 12 Pro Real World Photography Review   Roman's Magical HDR:  Faruk (iPhoneDo)   Casey's Video   Low Light iPhone 12 Dolby Vision Camera Test ft Wolf!   More WOLF!    YOUTUBE!
